scenario_text.value: Oh, Takuma! Look, over there!
Is that...Kaito?!

Kaito! You’re all right! It’s so good to see
you!

We couldn’t believe how fast you just
disappeared!
Uh, yeah... I’m a bit out of it myself...
Hey, what the heck happened?

Well, I mean... Visions of Shuuji and Ryo
showed up, then you and Dracmon vanished!

Oh yeah, that’s what went down. Shuuji and
Ryo came back, didn’t they?
What?

(Came back, he says... He doesn’t realize
they were illusions?)

What a couple of jerks. If you’re safe, then
say something, already.
Right, Takuma?
Hey, man... Those two are—!

Who cares, man. Where’s Miu? I wanna find her
and get the heck outta here.
Takuma... Isn’t he acting weird?
Right...

(Something about this just doesn’t seem
right. Why can’t I put my finger on it?)

(Kaito can be impulsive, but he has his
suspicious side, too.)

(Still, he thinks those illusions of Ryo and
Shuuji are real?)

(And even if Miu’s his top priority, he’s not
one to disregard the others like that.)
(What I want to know is...)
You trust the visions?
“Who cares,” you say?
Ryo and Shuuji were... Those were illusions.
Huh? Really?
You didn’t notice that, Kaito?
You serious, man? I didn’t notice at all.
(Yeah... Something ain’t right.)
I know you’re worried about Miu and all...
Don’t say “who cares” about Shuuji and Ryo.
Huh? And whaddaya care if I talk like that?

I don’t give two shits about anyone besides
Miu, you know that.
(I knew this was strange!)

(Kaito was so worried about Aoi. He’d never
talk about the others like that!)
(Not only that...)
Kaito... Where’s Dracmon?

Huh, now that you mention it, he’s gone,
ain’t he?
Damned if I know... Not that I care, anyway.
So mean... How can you talk like that?!

Jeez, what’re you getting on my ass for?! You
two just don’t know when to quit!
You... You aren’t Kaito.
Say what? You hear what you’re saying?

Kaito might have a mouth on him, but...he
cares a lot about his friends.

Not to mention the fact that he’d never talk
about Dracmon like that!

Are you another illusion?! Or maybe an enemy!
Show yourself!
AHHHHHH! QUIT YER GABBING!
Takuma! He’s changing!
Graaaaaaaaawr!
Damn... I knew it was an enemy!
Careful, Takuma! Here he comes!
